Your Open Source Java OpenGL GUI

View project on GitHub

Nifty 1.3.2 finally arrived

08 Oct 2012

Nifty 1.3.2 is mainly a bugfix release and is compatible with Nifty 1.3.1. There are a couple of nifty new features available too :) We've counted 175 individual changes which is A LOT</strong>!

There will be an updated Nifty Manual available soon. Until it is available you can find out what's new in the Nifty 1.3.2 change log (sf.net)</a>

And here are the other Nifty links:

Nifty 1.3.2 Download Folder at sf.net</a>
Nifty 1.3.2 Maven Projects Page (browse the JavaDoc online!)</a>
Get a nightly jME3 build with Nifty 1.3.2 (jME3_2012-10-08.zip+) </a>
Webstart - Nifty Default Controls Example (1.3.2)</a>
Webstart - Nifty Standard Examples (1.3.2)</a>

For Maven simply add our sf.net Nifty Maven Repo to your pom.xml:

  

    

      nifty-maven-repo.sourceforge.net</id>

      http://nifty-gui.sourceforge.net/nifty-maven-repo</url>

    </repository>

  </repositories></pre>


and upgrade your dependency to 1.3.2:


    

      lessvoid</groupId>

      nifty</artifactId>

      1.3.2</version>

    </dependency></pre>


Have a lot of fun with Nifty 1.3.2! The best Nifty since Nifty ;-)

void
